fields.Title of Presentation: The Story of Relationship: The Impact of Mentor Teacher Perceptions Into the Mentoring Relationship
fields.Description/Abstract:
The relationship between pre-service teachers and their mentor teachers has been defined
by roles that mentor teachers play in the relationship, but we know little about how the
relationship develops. This narrative inquiry study explored how a mentor teacher experienced
the relationship with a pre-service teacher candidate and compared the relationship to the
elements of a story. Findings demonstrate a connection between the teaching candidate’s
perceived personality traits or abilities and the mentor teacher’s willingness to engage in a
positive relationship. This study has the potential to inform teacher preparation programs and
stakeholders how to mitigate disruptive emotions, outlines steps to communicate expectations,
and confirms the importance of attending to the beginning of the relationship between a mentor
teacher and a teaching candidate.
